snippet: Jerzy Janowicz continued his remarkable run at the Paris Masters by reaching the semifinals, where he’ll face Gilles Simon.
abstract: Jerzy Janowicz defeats Janko Tipsarevic to advance to men's semifinals of Paris Masters tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Jerzy Janowicz continued his remarkable run at the Paris Masters by reaching the semifinals, where he’ll face Gilles Simon.

headline.seo: Jerzy Janowicz Advances to Semifinals of Paris Masters
headline.main: Qualifier Janowicz Advances to Paris Semifinals
